name: [AI Tools 101] AI error handling
description: In this [AI Tools 101](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dt-YY3xNLmM&list=PLrED3I754LhmTtlldfGklaEMh-ZaCa3EK&index=10&ab_channel=Make) course template, learn effective AI error handling with OpenAI and Anthropic Claude. Master techniques for setting variables, generating error messages, and parsing JSON to enhance your automation workflows.
